7.property: All Other Property and Liability Coverage Combinations
7.liability: All Other Property and Liability Coverage Combinations

8.property: Total exclusion of fungi, wet rot, dry rot or bacteria ('mold')
8.liability: Total exclusion of fungi, wet rot, dry rot or bacteria ('mold')

9.property: No exclusion or limitation for fungi, wet rot, dry rot, or bacteria ('mold') arising from a peril insured against
9.liability: No exclusion or limitation for fungi, wet rot, dry rot, or bacteria ('mold') arising from a peril insured against
